p.s: The article Globalised Environmental Pollution - Causes and Effects by Ankita Mitra which came out on February 5, 2014 in Blog on Evironment is about the massive problematic humanity will have with environmental pollution.
The author makes clear, that humanity is responsible for global warming and environmental pollution.
Traffic, industries and other sectors are the main reason.
Ankita Mitra sees huge effects and problems upcoming and some disasters which already happendhappened.
E.g. the leakage of MICmethyl isocyanate in India in the last decade.
Mrs. Mitra worries about future disasters and problems humanity will have as a result of their activities.
It is time to act or it will be totoo late.
